semantic_identifier: 116: feat: Sync Issue_Tracker status updates to Sales_Accelerator v2 remediation signals

sections.text:
## Description

Implements the outbound status sync pipeline from Issue_Tracker -> Sales_Accelerator v2 so deal-risk remediation signals stay current when an Issue_Tracker issue transitions state.

Key changes
- Added Issue_Tracker webhook/event consumer for issue status lifecycle updates (triaged/in_progress/resolved + generic status changes).
- Introduced `SalesAcceleratorRemediationUpdate` payload including:
  - `issue_id` (source identifier)
  - `status` (normalized status string)
  - `last_updated_at` (source timestamp)
  - `issue_url` (deep link to Issue_Tracker)
  - `work_links[]` (deep links to linked downstream work items like Linear/Jira, when present)
- Implemented Sales_Accelerator v2 client endpoint call to upsert remediation signal for all impacted deals referenced by the issue.

Reliability
- Idempotency: computes a stable idempotency key per (issue_id, status, last_updated_at) and sends it with the outbound request; duplicate events are safely ignored.
- Retries: adds exponential backoff with jitter for transient failures (5xx/timeouts/429), with max attempts and circuit logging.
- Failure handling: non-retryable errors (4xx excluding 429) are surfaced and not retried.

Observability
- Structured logs for each sync attempt including issue_id, impacted deal ids, response code, retry count, and latency.
- Metrics counters/gauges:
  - `sa_v2_issue_sync_success_total`
  - `sa_v2_issue_sync_failure_total` (tagged by error class)
  - `sa_v2_issue_sync_retry_total`
  - `sa_v2_issue_sync_latency_ms`

Notes
- No user-facing UI changes; sellers will see updated remediation status + links in Sales_Accelerator as events propagate.
- Feature is guarded by config/env toggle to enable per environment and can be rolled out gradually.

## How Has This Been Tested?

staging
